creator: alexc@mikon.info
text:
Apache 1.3.26 cannot properly handle files over 2Gb size.

wget log:

% wget --spider -S http://localhost/divx/Dogville.avi
--14:35:19--  http://localhost/divx/Dogville.avi
           => `Dogville.avi'
Resolving localhost... 127.0.0.1
Connecting to localhost[127.0.0.1]:80... connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response...
 1 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
 2 Date: Tue, 18 Nov 2003 11:35:19 GMT
 3 Server: Apache/1.3.26 (Win32) mod_gzip/1.3.19.1a
 4 Last-Modified: Thu, 13 Nov 2003 05:27:30 GMT
 5 ETag: "0-83978000-3fb31642"
 6 Accept-Ranges: bytes
 7 Content-Length: -2087223296
 8 Keep-Alive: timeout=15, max=100
 9 Connection: Keep-Alive
10 Content-Type: video/x-msvideo
200 OK
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 17453 ***
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
